title: Boy shoots himself in leg while trying to return fire in Cleveland drive-by shooting
content:
(File photo)
CLEVELAND, Ohio -- A 17-year-old boy shot himself in the leg while trying to return fire in a drive-by shooting near East 102nd Street and St. Clair Avenue.
The boy was walking about 4:45 p.m. Friday when someone shot at him from a passing car. The boy tried to pull out his own gun but shot himself in the leg, police said.
The boy was taken to MetroHealth Medical Center for treatment.
The incident is being investigated. The boy was unable to provide a description of the car or the person who shot at him, police said.
